      • createCar

        public Car createCar(java.lang.String type,
                     GPScoordinates carPosition)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a car and add it to the list of car of the MyUber instance
        Parameters:
        type - the String that match with the type of car in the CarFactory class
        carPosition - the position of the car
        Returns:
        the new car instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the type parameter does not match any type of car

      • createPool

        public Pool createPool(java.util.ArrayList<UberPool> listPoolRide)
        Create a pool and add it to the list of pool of the MyUber instance
        Parameters:
        listPoolRide - the list of UberPool rides to construct the pool
        Returns:
        the new pool instance

      • createCustomer

        public Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String customerName,
                               java.lang.String customerSurName,
                               GPScoordinates customerPosition,
                               int creditCardNumber)
        Create a customer and add it to the list of customer of the MyUber instance
        Parameters:
        customerName - the name of the customer
        customerSurName - the surname of the customer
        customerPosition - the initial position of the customer
        creditCardNumber - the credit card number of the customer
        Returns:
        the new customer instance

      • createDriver

        public Driver createDriver(Car car,
                           java.lang.String driverName,
                           java.lang.String driverSurName)
        Create a driver and add it to the list of driver of the MyUber instance
        Parameters:
        car - the car of the driver to be created
        driverName - the name of the driver to be created
        driverSurName - the surname of the driver to be created
        Returns:
        the new driver instance

        public Car getCarWithId(java.lang.String id)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a car with his id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the car to be found
        Returns:
        the car if it has been found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if car is not found

        public Customer getCustomerWithId(int id)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the customer if it has been found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if customer can not be found

        Returns:
        the driver
        Throws:

      • requireRide

        public RideFactory requireRide(Customer cust,
                               GPScoordinates endingPoint,
                               java.util.Date date)
        Compute the prices of all types of rides in function of the parameter and add messages to the box of the customer specified in parameter to give him the prices
        Parameters:
        cust - the customer who wants to require a ride
        endingPoint - the destination point were the customer wants
        date - the date of the requirement
        Returns:
        an instance of RideFactory constructed with the list of the different types of rides. Use the require method on this instance to choose the type of ride to require

      • register

        public void register(Ride ride)
        Add this ride to the list of rides of this MyUber instance and allocate a driver to the ride
        Parameters:
        ride - - ride to register

      • refuse

        public void refuse(Ride ride)
        Use this method to make a driver refuse a ride. The system will then try to find an other driver for the ride. This method only works if the status of the ride is unconfirmed.
        Parameters:
        ride - - the ride to be refused

      • confirm

        public java.lang.Boolean confirm(Ride ride)
        Use this method to make a driver accept a ride This method only works if the status of the ride is unconfirmed.
        Parameters:
        ride - - the ride to be accepted

      • mark

        public void mark(Ride ride,
                 int newmark)
        Give a mark to the driver of one of their ride. This method only works if the ride is completed and the ride hasn't already be marked
        Parameters:
        ride - - the ride which should get the mark
        newmark - - the given mark

      • cancel

        public void cancel(Ride ride)
        Cancel the ride. Only works if the ride is confirmed or unconfirmed, the customer cannot cancel ongoing rides.
        Parameters:
        ride- - the ride to be canceled

      • start

        public void start(Ride ride)
        Notify the system that a ride has started and credit the driver for the ride. The method only works if the ride is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        ride - - the ride which has started

      • finish

        public void finish(Ride ride)
        Notify the system that a ride has finished. The method only works if the ride is ongoing. The method also set the car and the customer positions to the destination point of the ride
        Parameters:
        ride - - the ride which finished
